UniprotID	Q86X76
Accession	Q86X76;B1AQP3;D3DVF4;O76091
EntryName	NIT1_HUMAN
ProteinName	Deaminated glutathione amidase (dGSH amidase) (EC 3.5.1.128) (Nitrilase homolog 1)
GeneName	NIT1
Length	327
Function	Catalyzes the hydrolysis of the amide bond in N-(4-oxoglutarate)-L-cysteinylglycine (deaminated glutathione), a metabolite repair reaction to dispose of the harmful deaminated glutathione. Plays a role in cell growth and apoptosis: loss of expression promotes cell growth, resistance to DNA damage stress and increased incidence to NMBA-induced tumors. Has tumor suppressor properties that enhances the apoptotic responsiveness in cancer cells; this effect is additive to the tumor suppressor activity of FHIT. It is also a negative regulator of primary T-cells.
Subcellular Location	Mitochondrion; Cytoplasm
Disorder	0.2715,0.1323,0.0817,0.1070,0.0704,0.0483,0.0253,0.0424,0.0568,0.0414,0.0531,0.0349,0.0719,0.0734,0.0870,0.1424,0.0909,0.0543,0.0209,0.0151,0.0160,0.0184,0.0341,0.0704,0.0704,0.0948,0.1298,0.2094,0.1137,0.1115,0.1671,0.1643,0.2436,0.1184,0.1275,0.1275,0.1528,0.1424,0.1528,0.2399,0.2064,0.1048,0.0909,0.0618,0.0531,0.0531,0.0662,0.0929,0.1184,0.1852,0.1942,0.2034,0.2164,0.1251,0.2258,0.2164,0.1759,0.1298,0.2094,0.1969,0.1643,0.2258,0.3667,0.3286,0.3667,0.3599,0.2849,0.2783,0.2193,0.1070,0.0676,0.0543,0.0269,0.0168,0.0380,0.0424,0.0341,0.0398,0.0531,0.0253,0.0253,0.0313,0.0320,0.0320,0.0454,0.0463,0.0518,0.0888,0.0555,0.0662,0.0929,0.1399,0.1759,0.3019,0.3053,0.2783,0.2609,0.2849,0.3149,0.2258,0.3460,0.4476,0.3807,0.3872,0.3774,0.2783,0.2783,0.2609,0.2715,0.2224,0.2258,0.2258,0.1528,0.0929,0.0765,0.0765,0.0765,0.0749,0.0398,0.0646,0.1162,0.1048,0.0929,0.1611,0.1702,0.1028,0.1731,0.2034,0.2094,0.2002,0.3117,0.2292,0.2094,0.3053,0.2715,0.2752,0.2884,0.2094,0.1449,0.2470,0.2399,0.2164,0.2164,0.1881,0.1323,0.0851,0.1206,0.1092,0.0592,0.0555,0.0506,0.0555,0.0948,0.1028,0.0463,0.1007,0.0676,0.1115,0.1070,0.1852,0.1759,0.1881,0.1942,0.2193,0.2094,0.1643,0.2399,0.2680,0.2680,0.3599,0.3704,0.3356,0.3566,0.3566,0.4652,0.5992,0.4901,0.5901,0.5577,0.7120,0.5951,0.5901,0.5901,0.6269,0.5493,0.5992,0.7415,0.6043,0.6089,0.5017,0.4766,0.4051,0.3249,0.2094,0.2193,0.1671,0.1671,0.1449,0.1501,0.1671,0.0929,0.1275,0.0817,0.0662,0.0341,0.0341,0.0356,0.0306,0.0518,0.0433,0.0780,0.0555,0.0494,0.1070,0.1070,0.1162,0.1399,0.1206,0.1229,0.1048,0.0948,0.0929,0.0967,0.1501,0.1942,0.2399,0.2715,0.1702,0.2094,0.1583,0.1229,0.0719,0.1206,0.1554,0.1528,0.2064,0.1162,0.1298,0.1554,0.2645,0.1611,0.0985,0.1137,0.0765,0.0646,0.0454,0.0454,0.0483,0.0443,0.0405,0.0605,0.0967,0.1476,0.1583,0.1852,0.1852,0.1852,0.2645,0.1611,0.1554,0.1476,0.2436,0.3019,0.2988,0.2988,0.3392,0.3948,0.3149,0.3053,0.4256,0.3631,0.2988,0.2715,0.2715,0.1554,0.1554,0.1671,0.1914,0.2129,0.3053,0.2193,0.1298,0.0799,0.0817,0.1
